评论概述: Versatile and comfortable shirt with few flaws
评论详情: This shirt is lightweight, breathable, and works well for casual and semi-casual settings. The fit was decent, though slightly loose around the middle, making it better tucked in. The fabric is soft and wrinkle-prone but doesn’t feel cheap. While the stitching appears solid, some creases from packaging were tough to remove. It’s versatile and stylish, though a pocket or better sizing would be welcome. Still, great value!
This shirt was a Christmas gift to my husband. It fit perfectly, and it is flattering. I recommend this shirt and the seller.
Very nice shirt. But it's too small for a medium.

I ordered shirt in August for a Christmas gift for my grandson.  He received shirt on 12/22/24. He followed as per washing instructions, however, shirt faded and had reddish tint after washing on cold and line drying. I realize it has been months since I purchased, but I buy gifts all year long as I find ones I want for family. Please advise as to how to proceed to make this defective purchase right.

评论概述: GREAT SHIRT BUT BUY IT ONLY FOR 25$. AMAZON TRYING TO SCAM! THEY PLAY WITH THE PRICE.
评论详情: GREAT SHIRT BUT BUY IT ONLY FOR 25$. AMAZON TRYING TO SCAM! THEY PLAY WITH THE PRICE.

This shirt is a winner whether you decide to wear it casually or for semi formal events. It is lightweight but falls on your frame nicely. The material doesn't appear cheap, and the color is perfectly neutral, making it versatile for a variety of looks. A winner in my book.

I have worn quite a few Coofandy products at this point most of them have been good quality especially on the materials side. One issue I have run into with this shirt is that the sizing is just really big, I ordered a small and got what would usually be a medium with most companies.  Outside of that color is exactly what I was expecting, the material is quality and breathable and the style is as expected. If you are between sizes I would definitely order a size down.

评论概述: Size runs big and long…not untucked style
评论详情: Perhaps I should have ordered a small, but medium often fits great. I prefer a fitted look and feel, and this was quite big for a medium, swimming around the middle, and it was very long and would look goofy without being tucked in. I’m 5’10” and 175 lbs. Quality and fabric seems good, but sizing is pretty off and marketed as untucked is just plain wrong.
A great fit for the summer. Very breathable and comfortable. Fits well and easy to clean.

I purchased a large for my hubby and it fits him just right. Didn’t shrink after washing, very good quality, and the fabric is textured. Loved the suttle color too. Purchased another one in gray too. He loves the shirt!

This shirt is what you expect it to be. The fit is standard (we ordered large on male who wears large and it fit as his others do), the material lightweight but questionable if it's truly linen as it doesn't cool as quickly as our other linen shirts. It looks good on though, and the cuffed arms and collared neck bring a little more class to the more casual material.

I was disappointed that it didn't have a pocket, i am a creature of habit and even though I stopped smoking 50 years ago i still want it even though I stopped carrying my pack of cigarettes there. The shirt is very nice but i should have gotten one with a little more color
Shirt is oh so comfortable and nice look.
Ajuste perfecto, excelente seleccion

Decent quality at a reasonable value and true to size while slightly loose fitting. It is soft & breathable with little to no stretch. The color is a deep black and works as a semi formal option. My fiancé definitely liked it.
This was the perfect button up for a late summer wedding on the beach. Would buy again in a heartbeat without question.
The product label indicates the fabric is 70% Polyester, 27% Viscose, and 3% Spandex. This is NOT linen. I ordered two shirts, thinking I was getting linen.  The shirts are ok, but pretty ordinary.
Had several people say good things about shirts while wearing them,
This is a Christmas gift for my son. Love the color and style and know he will love it also. Fabric is very nice.
Breathable material very comfortable. You can dress it up or down.

评论概述: It comes vacuum packed so wrinkles will be hard to remove!
评论详情: Looks good fits right, I have ironed twice and wrinkles still show a bit. This company sends everything this way even dress jackets, a little messed up!
Good shirt

评论概述: Light Material, Good Rolled-Up-Sleeves Design, Good Price
评论详情: I got this to supplement my summer wardrobe. It's my first-ever long-sleeved linen shirt, and I quickly came to really like it! Here are my thoughts:  *Material: I really like the light, breathable fabric! It's great for hot summer days, and it looks great! The only thing I have to be careful of with the white shirt I bought is to be vigilant to watch out for any stains--they've all come out so far. :)  *Design: I really like the straps that allow me to brace up the long sleeves into a rolled-up configuration. It feels my arms and elbows free and it's super comfortable.  *Price: The (current) price of $25 is just about right--it's a good-looking, good-quality shirt that I enjoy wearing!
Fits and looks great.
This product was for a grandson 's wedding
Fit perfectly for my size.I love the colors.
I like the shirt, but it's very short and will show your stomach if you raise your arms.
Nice shirt and it doesn’t wrinkle and soft but made with what feels like synthetic material

The Men’s Long Sleeve Button Down Linen Shirt is a stylish and versatile option for both casual and formal occasions. Made from breathable chambray fabric, it offers a relaxed yet polished look, perfect for events like weddings or casual outings. The shirt’s wrinkle-free design ensures you stay looking sharp without the hassle of ironing. Its untucked fit adds a laid-back vibe, making it easy to pair with jeans or dress pants. Lightweight and comfortable, it’s ideal for warm weather. Overall, it’s a great blend of style, comfort, and low-maintenance care.
Fits great looks great.  Goes with any color.
Wedding Perfect fitting
Comfortable and a very quality product.
Misrepresented as untucked length

It was very obvious that someone had returned this shirt before. It wasn’t packed like an unused new shirt. It came in a rewrap just waded up in a ball with cellophane around it. The tag was just hand tied back on and not a factory tag from the manufacturer. Bottom line is these type of shirts should be set back and when something like a pre worn sale comes up sell it then.

This is a very well-made shirt.  My son has trouble finding shirts that fit well, so we gave this a try.  It fits beautifully!  My other son (who wears only linen) picked it up and thought it actually was linen.  We will be buying more.
Very good quality, love the shirt.
Its comfortable, fits well

I bought four or five short sleeve button up shirts from this company that I loved, but they long sleeve shirts the sleeves run really big had to send it back I guess that’s why in the picture they show it rolled up
Its good quality cotton what is hard to find and my husband ordered in 4 colors. He loves it

评论概述: Boxy fit and tends to wrinkle
评论详情: The shirt is nice but the picture is a bit deceptive.  The picture suggested a slim or fitted look but while my shirt fit perfectly lengthwise, it was a bit boxy and baggy for my taste.  I didn't really love the fabric either as it felt a bit flat, even for linen.  It wrinkled easily after a wash and I haven't really been able to get it work well with my existing outfits.I did examine the buttons and seams and thought they were well sewn.  I'd say the construction is solid for the shirt.
My husband loves this shirt. It is comfortable and cut very well so it looks great on him. The color (green) is really nice. Good fabric for comfort and washability.
The material was light yet didn't feel cheap, can be worn casually or to a nice restaurant. Very happy with the fit and received many compliments. Great value!
Loved this shirt on my husband.

评论概述: Comfortable, Stylish, and Perfect for Casual or Business Wear
评论详情: The COOFANDY Men's Long Sleeve Button Down Linen Shirt has quickly become one of my favorite shirts. It’s super comfortable, with a lightweight, breathable fabric that feels great throughout the day. The fit is spot-on, and it looks sharp whether I’m going for a business casual look or dressing up for an evening out.  I’ve gotten plenty of compliments on the style, and I love that it’s wrinkle-free, making it easy to wear straight out of the closet. It’s not for formal occasions, but if you’re looking for something versatile that looks good and feels even better, this shirt is a great choice.
Im 5’9, 265lbs 40 inch waist. The 2XL Size was spot on.
XL is a bit big in the waist. Shirt isn’t tapered
This is far from being a linen shirt, very heavy ,collar had buttons, not as described

The fabric is nice and the shirt is very comfortable but some of the stitching is questionable and may pull out and have to be redone.  The shirt was also folded awkwardly in the packaging which resulted in a crease that has proven very difficult to remove.  Overall, a nice shirt for the price.  I just hope that a "City of Dreams" situation isn't producing it.

My husband wanted a nice white shirt to wear at a friend's beach reception party. This shirt has a sharp look that was appropriate if you want a casual but understated elegance to it. My husband especially like that he didn't have to tuck his shirt in because it gave him more latitude to move about and not feel restricted.
Good shirts for just hanging out and casual or under a sport coat … I own several

I really like this shirt. It fits true to size and is well made. The fabric is soft and the cut and design are good looking. There is an attractive texture to the fabric, yet its ever so slightly sheer, but not embarrassingly so. Coofandy has come a long way, and I am usually very happy with their products.  Nice shirt

评论概述: Use care when washing, you’ll need an iron
评论详情: Lost one star because it bleeds really bad in the first wash. Ruined some of my lighter clothes. Lost another star because the wrinkles from packaging did not come out just from washing. My wife said it looked good on me though so I gave back one star. I don’t usually get complements like that and it made me feel good.
This shirt contains no actual linen. It's basically rayon.  It's actually not a bad shirt, but didn't call it a linen shirt.

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable: A Perfect Shirt for Any Occasion
评论详情: The regular fit is relaxed and comfortable, making it perfect for all-day wear. The linen material is soft and breathable, which is great for warmer weather. Plus, it’s wrinkle-free, so it always looks sharp without the need for constant ironing. The minimalist design with a turn-down collar and button closure gives it a sophisticated look. The chambray texture adds a unique touch that sets it apart from other shirts in my wardrobe. It’s versatile enough to be worn untucked for a casual look or tucked in for a more formal occasion. I’ve worn this shirt to a wedding, a casual day out, and even to the office. It fits well in all these settings, making it a truly versatile piece. The long sleeves can be rolled up for a more relaxed look, adding to its adaptability. The craftsmanship is top-notch. The stitching is strong, and the fabric feels durable. After several washes, it still looks as good as new, which speaks to its quality.

Very happy with the fit, feel, and look of this shirt.  The shirt is made well, with quality seeming and button holes.  The material, despite being described as 'linen',  is polyester and viscose, so it is a bit thicker than linen expectations, but is still good quality.  It washed up well, with little to no wrinkling that needed ironing/steaming.  I got the 2x, which sometimes is too tight through the shoulders on me, but this one was reasonable.  The rest of the size of the 2x shirt was sized as stated and comfortable.  The 'medieval blue' was a great color, being light grey and navy blue mix.  Overall very happy with the quality and fit of this shirt, and can recommend it.
Color and fit are okay - but you BUY linen for hot climates so the fabric will breathe. This is polyester, viscose and spadex - buyer beware; I should have read deeper into the description.
Such a nice looking shirt. Great material. For dress or casual wear.

This shirt is a great casual dress shirt, comfortable, and perfect to wear either tucked or untucked, with slacks or shorts.  Neatly packaged and shipped fast.  I bought several of the same shirts before but in different colors and now am adding other colors to my closet.  Recommend this seller and product.

Because of the linen fabric, I got this as a shirt for my husband when we have casual outings, but he has liked it so much it has become one of his regular choices in his dress work shirt rotation. The shirt looks quite nice and the fabric is very light. It does not stretch, but it fits well enough that it's not an issue. Because of the look of it, you could wear this shirt to anything from a casual beach outing to a work event. Love the versatility and the comfort!
I feel like the shirts would be $80 if you walked into a department store. Very high-quality material, attention to detail. Really cool shirts
the shirt fit good
Completely false advertising. Linen is a nature fiber and this is made of mostly polyester.
The fabric is not linen! It is polyester/viscose/spandex! Over sized! Total waste of money!
This long sleeve button-down fits my son very well. He loves the color and enjoys how comfortable the material is. He had no complaints!

Got this one for my partner and it came well on time and well packed. Even though he usually wears a Medium, we opted for a size S going by the size chart, and it fits well. The color looks good and so the fabric feels pretty soft. Already washed it twice and it did not require any ironing or steaming. Zero wrinkles, literally,. Great formal shirt. Highly recommended!!

Please be informed that the product you purchased may not meet your expectations. It is important to note that the material composition of the shirt is 70% polyester, which differs from the real linen I was seeking. Don't be fooled. Do not buy! I am returning item.

评论概述: Very thin, almost no linen and not really shaped as a normal shirt
评论详情: Very thin, almost no linen and not really shaped as a normal shirt

Linen is made from flax and is very breathable. This is made from Polyester, rayon, and spandex, all of which are rather warm, regardless of how thin the shirt is. It is a very nice shirt with good quality, but I live in Central Florida and absolutely HATE how these materials feel in the summer! They will wick away sweat pretty well, so they are good for exercise clothes, but for everyday wear you'll feel kinda nasty. In all fairness, if you scroll down on the product page it does say what the shirt is made of, but I bought this in a hurry and went off the first description, which says linen. That's the only reason why I'm returning them and rating low.

I like the material and the linen look. It's comfortable and washed well. There was no shrinkage or bleeding in the wash which was good. The sleeves were a touch long on me but I tend to roll my sleeves anyway so that isn't an issue. It's not the most high end of shirts available but then again it's priced reasonably. Decent shirt for casual wear.
Very very happy eith the fit and feel of the shirt
Good quality and fit well for North American standards

评论概述: Not as advertised This shirt is Not Linen
评论详情: Heavyweight long sleeve shirt. Definitely not linen as advertised

The shirt material is not coarse but not soft. The image looks nicer than the actual shirt in person. I did like the color as they are unique. The XL was way too big on me (I'm 6.0' 185lbs). Too baggy on me. Wouldn't be my favorite shirt.

I love the "Linen" part of this shirt - feels so good. Nice texture of the fabric. And my husband likes that it's casual wear, not tucked in, and at the same time quite a classy look. I think this one is the best by this brand - and I've got several items from them by now.
Nice shirt! But doesn't feel at all like linen. It may be a blend of some sort but I was hoping for something much lighter.
I really like the fit and comfort of this shirt. It's so light and breathable for the heat.

I got the "tawny port" color and it is very pleasant and elegant! The linen fabric gives a very rustic look which I like. Am in general a big fan of the brand "Coofandy" and this product too does not disappoint. You can wear it sleeves roled up, tucked in or open jacket style with a tshirt inside. It all looks good. The overall stitch looks high quality and there are no thread imperfections. It comes with an extra button which is very handy! Highly recommend for a casual summer look!

I returned this shirt because it says it’s a linen shirt, but it’s not. After I received it, I went back to the description and discovered it’s mostly polyester. Yes, I should have read the description more carefully before ordering, but it shouldn’t be called linen if it isn’t.
Great quality material, the fabric is soft and comfortable. It fits true to size, and looks nice. The fabric is light weight but not to thin.

评论概述: Looks like linen, but is wrinkle free! Feels almost the same as cotton.
评论详情: The texture on this shirt really sets it apart and gives it class.  It doesn't have the typical polyester feel, either.  This feels much closer to cotton than I was expecting, and that's a GOOD thing.  I think it's the Viscose content that gives it this more cottony feel.  I love that it is wrinkle free and I love the style because it is very versatile.  I can wear it as casual or business either one.
Collar is from the 70s disco era and the material feels weird. Sent it back

评论概述: Fits true to size and comfortable
评论详情: This shirt is very comfortable to wear and is breathable. The cut looks good on me and the shoulders don't feel tight. I'll be grabbing a few more of these in other colors.

I am a big fan of this brand, and they are constantly at the top of Amazon’s best seller lists, and rightly so. Their products are always well designed and perfectly made, along with extremely fair pricing. This shirt is extremely comfortable and looks great as well.

The COOFANDY Men's Long Sleeve Button Down Linen Shirt in Veiled Rose offers a stylish yet casual look, perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions like weddings. Made from wrinkle-free chambray, it ensures a crisp appearance without the need for ironing. The untucked design adds to its versatility and comfort.

This is a really great lightweight fabric material. It's like linen but with a little bit more sheen and weight. It basically doesn't wrinkle like linen does. It retains its shape and falls quite nicely.  It's very easy to wear because it can be dressed up or down.  I would say it's a good value because it's quite versatile.

评论概述: Nice Quality and Smooth Finish Material - Wrinkle Free Design - Nice Casual Shirt
评论详情: Ordered this Men's Long Sleeve Button Down Linen Shirt Casual - Untucked Chambray Shirt Wrinkle Free for our yearly vacation use. I have psoriasis on my elbows and arms and a bit embarrassed of wearing a short sleeve shirt out in "public view". Have always mainly worn long sleeve shirts. While I was online looking for some clothing for our vacation, I saw this light weight casual long sleeve shirt and ordered it. I really like this shirt as it has nice material and of good quality. Also like the design of the collar and the nice smooth finish. The button down is my favorite type of shirt as well. Very nice shirt for casual or even a dressy look. Happy with order
I really like Coof & Andy shirts and jumped at the opportunity to add this new shirt to my collection.  Unfortunately, they sent the wrong size, so I cant wear it. A Large doesn't work for me.
I am not a huge fan of the fabric but it fits loosely making it a great shirt for cool evenings outside.

评论概述: Well made men's long sleeve shirt
评论详情: Coofandy has made another good quality men's button down shirt. The L fits like a men's Large. The fabric is comfortable on the skin and the *medieval blue* color gives the shirt an extra texture interest visually. (FYI-the gray color looks like it would do the same) This sets the shirt apart from a solid color button down for sure. Considering the quality and look, I would say, the price point is really good. A really handsome semi casual dress shirt.

评论概述: true to size but pink is brighter than pictured
评论详情: Looks a little different in person. Got the Veiled Rose color for my husband. Compared to the lighter dusty-rose color with slight grey lines on the Amazon product photos with the model, this shirt looks more like salmon pink in person. Don't really see much of the grey lines. My husband didn't mind since he finds this a good color for him. This pink shade does bring out the pink tones on his face. He likes to wear this shirt with a white undershirt, jeans, and either his white or light-grey canvas shoes.  Recommended.

Hubby just wore it to church this morning & he said that it was comfortable wearing it. It is also soft & the materials used on this fabric does not make him feel itchy. I chose an XL size for him but it’s a lil bit loose for his size though it’s manageable. I like the color on this long sleeves shirt, it’s cool to the eyes.

I have these shirts in a few different colors, so when I saw this one pop up I grabbed it to add to the collection. These shirts are very breathable and comfortable, wick sweat away and dry quickly, one of the big benefits of linen. They arrive vaccum flat packed, so they will be horribly wrinkled, so give them a wash and hang them up nicely when you first receive it. Like any linen, it is prone to picking up wrinkles while you wear it. So just be mindful of it. Color and size is spot on.

I love the way this shirt is made. It's a decent chambray with a nice, fun, light purple color. As with many offerings from this company, the shirt fits true to size - it will fit how you know it should fit! It's made of a supple, linen fabric that hangs exactly as you see it in the ad (forgive my pics, I haven't steamed it yet, LOL).  As usual with this brand, the clothes typically fit true to size - even a bit roomy. The shirt has the quality of being versatile (which I love). You can either dress it up or dress it more casually, tuck it in or wear it out - it's really up to you and how you like to style your clothes.  The one issue I had was an errant stitch on the left sleeve of the shirt (shown in the pic). While this is not a huge deal, it bears pointing out. Hopefully this is an isolated incident and not something you would find on all of these shirts (it looks really isolated). I plan to style this with rolled up sleeves (as seen in the ad), so it's no major issue, just wanted to point it out for quality control purposes.  At any rate, this is an awesome shirt - it's made well, wears well, and can compete with similar products with higher price tags! Even with the small stitching error, it's a win!

Whenever I see something is wrinkle-free I am generally skeptical. After washing and drying this shirt, I was very surprised to see minimal wrinkling! I am usually a large and this shirt was no exception. It is nice quality and not expensive! I recommend.

评论概述: Size down? Perhaps? Also, NOT linen!
评论详情: I really wanted to love this shirt. It is beautiful but ill-fitting on my hot husband. He's usually a Large, at 6'2" and between 185-190 lbs, but this screamed "blouse!" on him, unfortunately (see pics). I also included a pic of the tag: it is not linen. 70% polyester, 27% viscose, 3% spandex. But for the price, what would you expect? I love the color and if it were better shaped (I have absolutely loved another COOFANDY shirt on hubby), then it would be really great. This just missed the mark for us :(

Has a nice look to the fabric, just a very small amount of shine to it and just a little bit of stretch. Fits well, maybe just a tiny bit oversized but I've found that these type of long sleeve shirts seem to have that in common. If you like a little room get your normal size, if you want it to fit snug get a size under.

This shirt is a perfect length to be worn untucked with some linen pants or a nice pair of shorts.  Terrific evening wear for a night out in Miami beach or more relaxed in the Florida Keys.  Breathable and cut well.  Stitching and buttons are quality and the overall look is very flattering.  Lots of interesting color options but the photos don't really portray them well.

Super comfortable right out of the bag and looks really good. I chose Large, I am 6'3'' and 185 lbs and it is a good fit. Some shirts I need the XL but not so here. Interesting colour, they call it "tawny port" I'd say sort of maroon/burgundy with a hint of purple. Whatever you call it, I think it looks good.

评论概述: A great Coofandy lightweight shirt for causal, date night, and hot days
评论详情: As a Coofandy fan I again really like a shirt; this COOFANDY Men's Linen Long Sleeve Button Down Untucked Shirt, makes me happy with the look, cut, color, and weight. This COOFANDY Men's Linen Long Sleeve Button Down Untucked Shirt can be worn for an evening out, date night, work, or a range of options from casual to more formal. And the lightweight nature of the material is perfect for summer days, but I'd wear it year round - with or without a jacket.  The COOFANDY Men's Linen Long Sleeve Button Down Untucked Shirt I chose is medium green, rich in color, with its color looking great worn with several color options on pants. I don't think my pictures do the color justice. The material is soft and really, truly comfortable on, so much so it was almost surprising it was so nice. The material is also strong - tough - seems like it'll last. Along with the stitching and construction which is also great, I feel like this shirt is going to have some serious longevity to it. The sizing is spot on. I am loosing weight so not 100% into it - as you can see in the photo it's a little tight on me, but at the same time it fits, feels, and looks good already. This makes me believe there is a good range of sizes to allow one to use this shirt for weight fluctuations. Overall it's a really good shirt I truly like and once again impresses me about the Coofandy brand.

I got this for my boyfriend and he absolutely love this shirt! We ordered his regular size which is medium and it fits him perfectly! The shirt is super classy yet light, ideal for the hot weather down here in Florida. Super comfortable fabric (somewhat rustic but that's expected from linen), breathable, and it makes him looks so hot, nice fitting. Ideal for casual outfits or even for something a little bit more formal.  Super great quality and nice stitching, he has no complaints! Love it and would recommend!  .
